default.description: The default border color for most ui elements excluding inputs

default-emphasis-high.description: White, at twenty-five percent opacity, to be used on high-emphasis (dark) backgrounds

muted.description: A lighter neutral border color for images and videos, when needed

muted-emphasis-high.description: White, at fifteen percent opacity, to be used on high-emphasis (dark) backgrounds

strong.description: A darker neutral color for inputs, checkboxes, and radio buttons

strong-emphasis-high.description: White, at fifty percent opacity, to be used on high-emphasis (dark) backgrounds

focus.description: Used for focus and hover states on inputs and certain buttons

error.description: Used for inputs when an error is found
